name: Where Am I? (bbpw)
description:
THIS IS A DEMO

This is a short prototype demo for the horror game "Where Am I?" made for a college project, feel free to test and give a review! There might be a bug here and there, so i really appriciate your opinions and feedbacks.

Game length ~ 5 minutes

Note: Itch will ask you to pay 1€. That is completely OPTIONAL, simply press "no thanks" above and enjoy.
